channel.title: Pong
channel.description: Well, as I've said that I'm leaving MoparScape for other things outside of the RSPS community, this might give you a general idea of what I'm doing, I whipped up this simple Pong code: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L4HdY93XAwQ&feature=player_embedded

item.title: Pong
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:9, topic:407587”]Lol wait wait wait. Your leaving moparscape so you can further develop an emulation of pong…? Why are you leaving here, Im sorry I just don’t see the advantages of leaving…[/quote]That’s just an example, not going to be developing pong for 2-6 months, haha.

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:11, topic:407587”]player 1 failed epicly.[/quote]I was both Player 1 and 2.

Read full topic

Why are you leaving here, Im sorry I just don’t see the advantages of leaving…[/quote]He seemed to think he could only be a member of one community at a time But no he said it was to further his Java knowledge in entirety, and I think I convinced him to still stick around.

item.title: Pong
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:7, topic:407587”]I think you misunderstood me, I’m not saying that you need to work on RSPS anymore, I’m just saying that you can stay here (post projects, ask for help, etc) just like you did with this thread There are some people that know what they are talking about here, they could give you some real advice and feedback etc :P[/quote]Oh I get it now, but I’ve already found a few people that are going to help me out, I’ll try to remember to get on here.

Read full topic

I think you misunderstood me, I’m not saying that you need to work on RSPS anymore, I’m just saying that you can stay here (post projects, ask for help, etc) just like you did with this thread There are some people that know what they are talking about here, they could give you some real advice and feedback etc

item.title: Pong
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:5, topic:407587”]And why exactly does learning more about programming mean you have to go? We need more people that know what they are doing here.[/quote]I’m trying to be completely focused on other things outside of RSPS so I can come back much better than before. I’m trying to have no distractions from other programming.
